We advocate gender equality and  strive to  achieve a balance in our workforce . Our current aim is for 
women to form more than 35% of our global workforce.  This goal has been  achieved  in the past two  
years  and we also made significant progress from CY2016 to CY2017 . The increase in headcount at 
Suzhou site to support consumables prod uction led to a higher proportion of women being hired was 
the main contributor to the increase in women in K&S’ workforce i n CY2017. We seek to continue 
maintaining this benchmark  in the coming years.
